org.mmbase.module.smtp

Interface MailHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChainedMailHandler, CloudMailHandler, Forwarder, VerifyEmailMailHandler

    public interface MailHandler
    A MailHandler handles one mail. So you must create a new one for every received message (You can use MailHandler.Factory).
    Version:
    $Id$
